results.title: How to work with your fellow managers
results.creator_credit: Pare Lorentz Jr and BNA Communications
results.brief_description:
Episode number 2 of Series “The Manager and the Organization”.
Peter Drucker hosts this film which shows how friction, lack of understanding and poor teamwork among managers is largely a matter of poor relationships, rather than poor communication. Managers do not try to understand the different objectives of each section.

results.title: How to windsurf
results.brief_description: This video is designed to teach windsurfing in seven lessons. Information on how to assemble the board, how to get underway, steering, tacking, gybing and a section concerning safety are included. The video is designed so that each lesson is self-contained. The lessons are aimed at beginners of any age.

results.title: How to use your video camera
results.creator_credit: Terry McDonald, Janet West, Bob West and Video Pro
results.brief_description: This video has been produced by television production professionals with the video camera novice in mind. It covers the following crucial areas to consider when attempting to create a more watchable and enjoyable tape: forward planning, camera technique, lighting and sound, and an emphasis on practicing often to perfect the techniques described. The specific techniques include; how to operate the camera effectively, how to light a scene, record the sound occurring within a scene, when to consider adjusting the camera’s colour balance, focussing, exposure, stability, composition of the picture, changing angles for interest and care of the equipment.

results.title: How to use the telephone
results.creator_credit: Michael Law, H M Treasury and Public Relations Films
results.brief_description: A training film made for use in Government (British) departments pointing out common mistakes in using the telephone and showing how a proper understanding of the relationship between caller, switchboard and extension-user can save a great deal of valuable time and energy.

results.title: How to use classroom films
results.brief_description: This film introduces the basic principles necessary for an effective presentation and utilisation of a classroom film. It illustrates methods of choosing and reserving a film, pre-viewing, preparing the class, and initiating a follow-up discussion.

results.title: How to train with video: how to choose them and use them to fast-forward training in your organization
results.creator_credit: Matthew A Keller and CareerTrack Publications
results.brief_description: This program shows how video can be used in training. Topics such as what to look for in video training, what kinds of programs are available, the benefits of training using video and how to set up an overall video training program.
